name: LipService
0:
”Alexa, launch lip service”
”Alexa, start lip service”
”Alexa, ask lip service for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lip service
des:
Lip Service provides a heart-felt ego boost to you or your man! A silly, tongue-in-cheek jab at the fragile male ego, this skill provides endless hours of fun!

Does your man have a fragile male ego? Does he constantly need praise and adoration? Do you just want an automated method of delivering humorous, light-hearted, not to be taken seriously praise throughout the day? Then let Lip Service do the heavy lifting!

Better yet! Train your man to request his own praise and adoration whenever he feels down, or believes he has just performed some incredible feat of engineering and desires your glowing words of praise!

Alexa, launch Lip Service!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
